repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04

RUN apt-get clean && apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y locales && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN locale-gen en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANGUAGE en_US:en
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8
ENV TERM dumb
ENV PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8

RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get upgrade -y
RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y git curl software-properties-common unzip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get update && add-apt-repository -y ppa:deadsnakes/ppa && apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y python3.6 python3.6-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN curl -f https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | python3.6
RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y libgtk-3-dev libboost-all-dev build-essential cmake libffi-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y firefox && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone https://github.com/ThoughtfulDev/EagleEye
WORKDIR EagleEye
RUN pip3.6 install -r requirements.txt
RUN pip3.6 install --upgrade beautifulsoup4 html5lib spry
ADD https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/download/v0.24.0/geckodriver-v0.24.0-linux64.tar.gz /EagleEye/geckodriver.tar.gz
RUN tar -xvf geckodriver.tar.gz && rm geckodriver.tar.gz
RUN mv geckodriver /usr/bin/geckodriver
RUN chmod +x /usr/bin/geckodriver
RUN rm -r /EagleEye/known/
ENTRYPOINT bash /entry.sh
